content: Yeah, it's tough do this; I had the same problem. Basically the screws they have for wing clamps require specialized tools.. OEM bullshit really. You'll either need to find a seraph to produce them for you or get your superior to do it.
fuuuuuuck. i might just put up with it in that case. the feedback makes it easy to ignore, but. damn. thank you. solved

Thank you for marking this question as solved. Good luck with your future endeavours.
